commit message: Use setuptools declarative syntax through setup.cfg
ground truth: * Configure setuptools using setup.cfg.
target descr: * Configure setuptools using setup.cfg.

ground truth: * Fix #201: handle ‎/‏ marks mid-text within stressed tags or right after stressed tags.
target descr: * Fix #201: handle ‎/‏ marks mid-text within stressed tags or right after stressed tags.

ground truth: * Feature #213: ``images_as_html`` config option to always generate an ``img`` html tag. preserves "height", "width" and "alt" if possible.
target descr: * Feature #213: ``images_as_html`` config option to always generate an ``img`` html tag. preserves "height", "width" and "alt" if possible.

commit message: Add a __main__.py file to the package
ground truth: * Add ``__main__.py`` module to allow running the CLI using ``python -m html2text ...``.
target descr: * Add ``__main__.py`` module to allow running the CLI using ``python -m html2text ...``.

commit message: Remove unused unescape() function and related support code
ground truth:
* Remove unused or deprecated:
	* ``html2text.compat.escape()``
	* ``html2text.config.RE_UNESCAPE``
	* ``html2text.HTML2Text.replaceEntities()``
	* ``html2text.HTML2Text.unescape()``
	* ``html2text.unescape()``
target descr:
* Remove unused or deprecated:
	* ``html2text.compat.escape()``
	* ``html2text.config.RE_UNESCAPE``
	* ``html2text.HTML2Text.replaceEntities()``
	* ``html2text.HTML2Text.unescape()``
	* ``html2text.unescape()``

ground truth: * Feature #193: Add support for the <q> tag.
target descr: * Feature #193: Add support for the <q> tag.

commit message: fix the test failures on windows/cygwin due to
ground truth: * Fix #160: The html2text tests are failing on Windows and on Cygwin due to differences in eol handling between windows/*nix
target descr: * Fix #160: The html2text tests are failing on Windows and on Cygwin due to differences in eol handling between windows/*nix

ground truth: * Feature #164: Housekeeping: Add flake8 to the travis build, cleanup existing flake8 violations, add py3.6 and pypy3 to the travis build
target descr: * Feature #164: Housekeeping: Add flake8 to the travis build, cleanup existing flake8 violations, add py3.6 and pypy3 to the travis build

commit message: adds support for "700", "800", and "900" as bold style indicators
ground truth: * Adds support for numeric bold text indication in ``font-weight``, as used by Google (and presumably others.)
target descr: * Adds support for numeric bold text indication in ``font-weight``, as used by Google (and presumably others.)

commit message: Deprecation warning for retrieval over internet
ground truth: * Deprecation warnings for URL retrieval.
target descr: * Deprecation warnings for URL retrieval.

commit message: add baseurl functionality to inplace urls
ground truth: * Fix #113: inplace baseurl substitution for and tags.
target descr: * Fix #113: inplace baseurl substitution for and tags.

commit message: add baseurl functionality to inplace urls to tags also
ground truth: * Fix #113: inplace baseurl substitution for and tags.
target descr: * Fix #113: inplace baseurl substitution for and tags.

commit message: - Render <s> <del> <strike> as '~~text~~' in markdown - Rendering them as tags did not make sense.
ground truth: * <s>, <strike>, <del> now rendered as ~~text~~.
target descr: * <s>, <strike>, <del> now rendered as ~~text~~.

commit message: Test passing for long wrap links. New option --no-wrap-links Basic link ignore added.
ground truth: * Fix #38: Long links wrapping controlled by ``--no-wrap-links``.
target descr: * Fix #38: Long links wrapping controlled by ``--no-wrap-links``.

ground truth: * Feature #83: Add callback-on-tag.
target descr: * Feature #83: Add callback-on-tag.

commit message: Added option via command line to control decode errors.
ground truth: * Fix #87: Decode errors can be handled via command line.
target descr: * Fix #87: Decode errors can be handled via command line.

ground truth: * Fix #71: Coverage detects command line tests.
target descr: * Fix #71: Coverage detects command line tests.

commit message: Added all options as command line flags.
ground truth: * Feature #82: More command line options. See docs.
target descr: * Feature #82: More command line options. See docs.

commit message: Support for image sizing using raw html
ground truth: Write image tags with height and width attrs as raw html to retain dimensions
target descr: Write image tags with height and width attrs as raw html to retain dimensions

commit message: Anchor tags that contain tags or empty text are no longer discarded. Added tests for new cases, modified text for images-to-alt to allow for inline tags.
ground truth: * Fix #38: Anchor tags with empty text or with ```` tags inside are no longer stripped.
target descr: * Fix #38: Anchor tags with empty text or with ```` tags inside are no longer stripped.

commit message: Add single line break configuration (use case: Evernote)
ground truth: * Feature #51: Add single line break option.      This feature is useful for ensuring that lots of extra line breaks do not end up in the resulting Markdown file in situations like Evernote .enex exports. Note that this only works properly if ``body-width`` is set to ``0``.
target descr: * Feature #51: Add single line break option.      This feature is useful for ensuring that lots of extra line breaks do not end up in the resulting Markdown file in situations like Evernote .enex exports. Note that this only works properly if ``body-width`` is set to ``0``.
